amendment.description: To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Navy, up to an additional $3,000,000 to fund improvements to physical security at Navy recruiting stations and to improve data security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4863 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 228.

action.text: Amendment SA 4863 proposed by Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S8716-8718; text: CR S8717) To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Navy, up to an additional $3,000,000 to fund improvements to physical security at Navy recruiting stations and to improve data security.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4863 proposed by Senator Menendez.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4863 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 228.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4863 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 0. Record Vote Number: 228.
